base.name: Alcohol Reference
base.description: Reference to and/or images of alcoholic beverages

base.name: Animated Blood
base.description: Discolored and/or unrealistic depictions of blood

base.name: Blood
base.description: Depictions of blood

base.name: Blood and Gore
base.description: Depictions of blood or the mutilation of body parts

base.name: Cartoon Violence
base.description: Violent actions involving cartoonlike situations and characters. May include violence where a character is unharmed after the action has been inflicted

base.name: Comic Mischief
base.description: Depictions or dialogue involving slapstick or suggestive humor

base.name: Crude Humor
base.description: Depictions or dialogue involving vulgar antics, including “bathroom” humor

base.name: Drug Reference (ESRB)
base.description: Reference to and/or images of illegal drugs

base.name: Fantasy Violence
base.description: Violent actions of a fantasy nature, involving human or nonhuman characters in situations easily distinguishable from real life

base.name: Intense Violence
base.description: Graphic and realisticlooking depictions of physical conflict. May involve extreme and/or realistic blood, gore, weapons and depictions of human injury and death

base.name: Language (ESRB)
base.description: Mild to moderate use of profanity

base.name: Lyrics
base.description: Mild references to profanity, sexuality, violence, alcohol or drug use in music

base.name: Mature Humor
base.description: Depictions or dialogue involving "adult" humor, including sexual references

base.name: Nudity (ESRB)
base.description: Graphic or prolonged depictions of nudity

base.name: Partial Nudity (ESRB)
base.description: Brief and/or mild depictions of nudity

base.name: Real Gambling
base.description: Player can gamble, including betting or wagering real cash or currency

base.name: Sexual Content (ESRB)
base.description: Nonexplicit depictions of sexual behavior, possibly including partial nudity

base.name: Sexual Themes (ESRB)
base.description: References to sex or sexuality

base.name: Sexual Violence
base.description: Depictions of rape or other violent sexual acts

base.name: Simulated Gambling
base.description: Player can gamble without betting or wagering real cash or currency

base.name: Strong Language (ESRB)
base.description: Explicit and/or frequent use of profanity

base.name: Strong Lyrics
base.description: Explicit and/or frequent references to profanity, sex, violence, alcohol or drug use in music

base.name: Strong Sexual Content
base.description: Explicit and/or frequent depictions of sexual behavior, possibly including nudity

base.name: Suggestive Themes
base.description: Mild provocative references or materials

base.name: Tobacco Reference
base.description: Reference to and/or images of tobacco products

base.name: Use of Alcohol
base.description: The consumption of alcoholic beverages

base.name: Use of Drugs
base.description: The consumption or use of illegal drugs

base.name: Use of Tobacco
base.description: The consumption of tobacco products

base.name: Violence (ESRB)
base.description: Scenes involving aggressive conflict. May contain bloodless dismemberment

base.name: Violent References
base.description: References to violent acts

base.name: D
base.description: suggestive dialogue (usually means talks about sex)

base.name: L
base.description: coarse or crude language

base.name: S
base.description: sexual situations

base.name: V
base.description: violence

base.name: FV
base.description: fantasy violence (children's programming only)

base.name: Language (MPAA)
base.description: Mild to moderate use of profanity

base.name: Sexual Content (MPAA)
base.description: Nonexplicit depictions of sexual behavior, possibly including partial nudity

base.name: Sexual Themes (MPAA)
base.description: References to sex or sexuality

base.name: Violence (MPAA)
base.description: some depitcions of violence

base.name: Drug Reference (MPAA)
base.description: Reference to and/or images of illegal drugs

base.name: Nudity (MPAA)
base.description: Graphic or prolonged depictions of nudity

base.name: Partial Nudity (MPAA)
base.description: Brief and/or mild depictions of nudity

base.name: Strong Language (MPAA)
base.description: Explicit and/or frequent use of profanity
